channel.title: Pick on ossem: a creative space
channel.description: Recent content in Pick on ossem: a creative space

item.title: Pick
item.description: She is. So. Perfectly. Sad. The drops. Of thunder. Pick. Brilliance. Apart. Her sadness. Her sadness. In me. Her sadness. Picks apart. In me. Tops of trees. In me. Tops of trees. In me. And with her tears. Breaks along. Her sadness. In me. Song of cheers. Elegance. Tears. Beautiful sadness. In me. In me. Beautiful sadness. Elegant madness. Wisdom dances. Around. Without. Counterpart. Tear apart. Trenches of tears. Cheeks and bleaks.

item.title: Pick
item.description: I opened the door and was immediately confused on how I should feel. The little shop was more crowded than any time I had seen it. I could only guess the age group. Junior High? High school? I didn’t see any adults. A youth group, maybe? The door closed behind me and I felt the old familiar rush of anxiety that I was the center of attention as everyone took a look at me to size me up.
